Learning the basics

  • Getting started: general overview and description of the method, for both R and Python users.

R

  • Training a model in R
  • Downstream analysis in R
  • Gene set enrichment analysis: demonstrates how to do gene set enrichment analysis in R.

Python

  • Training a model in Python (jupyter notebook)
  • Downstream analysis in Python:

Case examples (in R)

  • (authors’ favourite) Analysis of chronic lymphocytic leukaemia cohort for personalised medicine: a bulk multi-omics data set. Figure 2 and 3 of the MOFA v1 paper.
  • (authors’ favourite) Integrative analysis of the Chromium Single Cell Multiome ATAC + Gene Expression assay: the new multi-modal protocol released by 10x Genomics.
  • Analysis of a time course scRNA-seq data set using the multi-group framework: Figure 2 of the MOFA+ paper.
  • Integration of scNMT-seq data: Figure 4 of the MOFA+ paper.
  • Integration of SNARE-seq data: scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq from the same cell)
  • Analysis of CITE-seq data: still in preparation, reach us if you have questions…
  • Analysis of multi-modal microbiome data
  • Demonstration of the stochastic inference algorithm (for very large data sets)
